title.en: An Aspiration for the Final Age

text.en: Namo! From the depths of my heart, I take refuge in the Three Jewels.
text.en-trans: namo, könchok sum la nying né kyab su chi

text.en: Until I gain acceptance of the unborn nature of reality,
text.en-trans: kyemé chö la zöpa matobpar

text.en: May I never again fall into the lower realms
text.en-trans: ngendrö né namyang mi tung zhing

text.en: But attain a human body, superior even to a godly form.
text.en-trans: lhawé lhakpé lü ten tobpar shok

text.en: Even if I attain the higher realms, nowhere in saṃsāra
text.en-trans: tori tob kyang dukngal nam sum gyi

text.en: Is free from the bonds of the three types of suffering.
text.en-trans: dam la ma zhak khorwa yö min na

text.en: And even within fortunate realms, may I avoid a form
text.en-trans: dendrö ten la nya ngen dawé gek

text.en: That would obstruct nirvāṇa, such as the unfree states.
text.en-trans: mikhom né dang tsungden lü pong shok

text.en: May I avoid birth as an evil king or minister lacking restraint,
text.en-trans: dom min gyünden gyal lön dik tochen

text.en: Who takes delight in warfare and twists and flouts the law.
text.en-trans: yul lé ga dang zhal ché khyokpor chö

text.en: May I not become a servant, lowly and tormented,
text.en-trans: jewö dren gyur nyamchung narwa dang

text.en: Or a merchant, or anyone who is devious or at fault.
text.en-trans: tsongpa dang ni yönchen lü pong shok

text.en: May I not become a steward who steals the Saṅgha’s wealth,
text.en-trans: könchok kor trok gendün lejé dang

text.en: Or one without qualities or liberation who appropriates funds.
text.en-trans: den drol nyimé kor la rang gar chö

text.en: May I avoid rebirth as a renunciant who offends householders
text.en-trans: lek mön dönnyer khyimpa sün jinchen

text.en: As they strive for better rebirth and who torments the minds of others.
text.en-trans: zhen gyü sekpé gejong lü pong shok

text.en: May I not become someone as ill-natured as a serpent
text.en-trans: rangzhin ngenpa drul duk tabu dang

text.en: Or one whose envy of others’ wealth resembles an asura’s.
text.en-trans: zhen jor la dang lha mayin gyi sem

text.en: May I avoid rebirth as one who deceives the venerable
text.en-trans: kyabö lu zhing chö la dangwa dang

text.en: And despises the Dharma, or as a thief, a robber or a hunter.
text.en-trans: ku dang trok jom ngönpé lü pong shok

text.en: May I avoid the five boundless crimes and five similar misdeeds,
text.en-trans: tsammé nga am dé dang nyewa nga

text.en: And refrain from remorselessly committing the ten non-virtues.
text.en-trans: mi gé chu la gyösem mewar chö

text.en: May I avoid all major forms of wrongdoing and misconduct,
text.en-trans: nak la mé bar drang tsang tibpa sok

text.en: Such as setting forests ablaze or stealing honey from hives.
text.en-trans: khana mato ché lé tarwar shok

text.en: Avoiding such plights, now, at the close of the five hundred,1
text.en-trans: detar tar né dani ngabgyé tar

text.en: Having gained the precious support of a human body,
text.en-trans: kyebü lü ten milü rinpoche

text.en: Whether as a monastic or upholder of lay vows,
text.en-trans: rabtu jung ngam chikshö yang ni rung

text.en: May I inherit the lineage of the bodhisattvas.
text.en-trans: changchub sempé rikchen tobpar shok

text.en: As soon as I’m reborn, may I meet a master who flawlessly
text.en-trans: kyé ma tak tu tekpa chenpö lam

text.en: And authentically teaches the Mahāyāna path,
text.en-trans: manor ngönsum tönpé lama dang

text.en: And by pleasing him or her in every way,
text.en-trans: jal né nampa küntu nyé jé ching

text.en: May I gain the wisdom of hearing, contemplation and meditation.
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé sherab denpar shok

text.en: Furthermore, by possessing the motivation of bodhicitta
text.en-trans: deyang sampa changchub sem dangden

text.en: And familiarizing myself with the application of the six perfections,
text.en-trans: jorwa parol chin druk la gompé

text.en: May I gain the supreme good fortune to traverse all at once
text.en-trans: lam nga sa chu ngak kyi denö la

text.en: The five paths and ten stages and master the tantra collection!
text.en-trans: chikchar dröpé kalwa chokden shok
